document_data.name: Jobinov
document_data.Description: A somewhat rotund man, Jobinov had slicked-back, black hair, and wore purple and black clothing.
document_data.History: After running away from his childhood home at the age of thirty-two, Jobinov was kidnapped by [[neogi]] slavers. He eventually escaped, but never thought of returning to a "groundling" existence again. On a visit to the world of [[Toril]], Jobinov was taught to master the use of a lasso by a group of [[Tuigan]] warriors.
